channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- P10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- P10

item.title: CVE-2018-7938|2024-08-05T06:37:59.691Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- p10
item.description: P10 Huawei smartphones with the versions before Victoria-AL00AC00B217 have an information leak vulnerability due to the lack of permission validation. An attacker tricks a user into installing a malicious application on the smart phone, and the application can read some hardware serial number, which may cause sensitive information leak.
